Press Release: Ken Loach , director of the film Looking For Eric Schmidt , stated: This raid is the action of a bully. Migrant workers are amongst the most vulnerable- poorly paid and far from home. Recent action by Unison to secure better wages and conditions at SOAS was good news. Now we wonder if the SOAS cleaners are being targeted because they dared to organise as trade unionists. We should all stand with them in solidarity in the face of this victimisation.
